allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Mattermost integration with sidebar navigation

- Add Mattermost as sidebar nav item between Accounts and Sign Out
- Full-page Mattermost view with iframe embedding
- Auto-create Mattermost users on CRM registration
- Session verification to logout deleted users
- Backend API integration with Mattermost bot

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Auth: No key \(expect 401\) ===" curl -s -w "\\nSTATUS: %{http_code}" http://localhost:5000/api/crm/contacts/1 echo "" echo "" echo "=== 2. Auth: Wrong key \(expect 401\) ===" curl -s -w "\\nSTATUS: %{http_code}" -H "x-api-key: wrong" http://localhost:5000/api/crm/contacts/1 echo "" echo "" echo "=== 3. GET /contacts/1 ===" curl -s -w "\\nSTATUS: %{http_code}" -H "x-api-key: $CRM_KEY" "http://localhost:5000/api/crm/contacts/1" cat /c/Users/Admin/crm_test.json)
